headline: Chipotle's viral portion size controversy has sparked a shareholder lawsuit
summary: Chipotle Mexican Grill (CMG) is facing a class action lawsuit from shareholders who claim the company misled investors about inconsistent portion sizes, leading to higher costs and a significant dip in stock value.

raw.headline: Chipotle's viral portion size controversy has sparked a shareholder lawsuit

headline: Chipotle Stock Rises as Investors Digest News That Scott Boatwright Will Be CEO
summary: Chipotle's shares rose Tuesday as investors digested the news that the fast-casual chain had formally named Scott Boatwright its CEO.
